I understand you're frustrated, Sarah, and I want to help resolve this screen issue before your presentation tomorrow. Let me gather some information to find the best solution quickly.

First, when did this black screen issue start occurring? Was it after any recent updates or changes to your UltraBook Pro?

---

It started three days ago out of nowhere! I didn't install anything new or update anything - I was just working on my presentation and suddenly the screen went black for a few seconds, then came back. At first I thought it was just a one-time glitch, but now it's happening constantly every 10 minutes like clockwork. 

Look, I don't have time to troubleshoot for hours - I need a solution that actually works. Can you remote in and fix this or do I need a replacement unit? This presentation is make-or-break for my company.

<ACTION>
type: CLARIFY
parameters: { "reason": "Need order ID to proceed with replacement or return options" }
</ACTION>

I completely understand your urgency with the presentation tomorrow, and I want to get this resolved quickly for you. The intermittent black screen issue you're describing sounds like it could be a hardware problem that may require a replacement.

To expedite a replacement unit, I'll need your order ID for the UltraBook Pro. Do you have that available? Once I have it, I can immediately check your warranty status and replacement options to get you back up and running as soon as possible.
